page.title: 01NORTH BURNESS
page.content: This area has only 48 inhabitants as you will know if you read page 2.There are a wide variety of occupations dealt with on page 3 and some of these varying lifestyles can be seen in detail on pages 4,11,13,15,16 and 17. Beachcombing is popular in the area and you can see why on page 9.We have many wild animals and you can find out about Birds on page 14 and Mammals on page 7.Local Norse_derived place names are dealt with on page 5.The bi_annual St.Colms Model Yacht Regatta on Roos Loch is featured on page 10. There are local buildings and places of interest on pages 8,11,12 and 18 including the Holms of Ire and the Stone at Scar.On page 20 we thank and mention the local people who made this project possible.
